title: Scaling Netflix Microservices
problem: Challenges with scaling monolithic architecture under high traffic.
solution: Adopted microservices architecture, containerization, and AWS cloud deployment.
results: Improved scalability, reduced downtime, and supported 200M+ users globally.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Uber’s Real-Time Matching System
problem: Inefficient rider-driver matching caused delays and cancellations.
solution: Developed a real-time dispatch system using machine learning and geospatial data.
results: Reduced average wait time by 30% and increased successful ride matches.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Spotify’s Recommendation Engine
problem: Users struggled to discover new music relevant to their taste.
solution: Built a recommendation system using collaborative filtering and deep learning.
results: Boosted user engagement by 40% and improved playlist personalization.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Airbnb’s Data-Driven Growth
problem: Difficulty in scaling listings and ensuring customer trust globally.
solution: Leveraged machine learning for pricing, fraud detection, and search personalization.
results: Increased bookings by 30% and improved customer retention.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Amazon’s One-Click Checkout
problem: Users abandoned carts due to long checkout processes.
solution: Implemented one-click checkout with secure payment gateways.
results: Reduced cart abandonment by 50% and improved sales conversions.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Flipkart’s Big Billion Day Scaling
problem: Traffic spikes during festive sales caused downtime and order failures.
solution: Implemented distributed caching, Kubernetes scaling, and optimized APIs.
results: Handled 1.5M+ concurrent users smoothly with 99.9% uptime.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Google’s PageRank Algorithm
problem: Search results lacked relevance and quality.
solution: Developed PageRank algorithm to rank websites based on backlinks and relevance.
results: Set new standards in web search accuracy and user satisfaction.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Tesla’s Self-Driving AI
problem: Autonomous vehicles faced challenges with safety and perception accuracy.
solution: Developed advanced computer vision and AI-driven autopilot systems.
results: Improved autopilot safety and enabled semi-autonomous driving worldwide.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Zoom’s Pandemic Growth
problem: Rapid user growth caused server overloads during the pandemic.
solution: Migrated to scalable cloud infrastructure and enhanced video compression.
results: Supported 300M+ daily meetings without major outages.
author: EduVault Research Team

title: Microsoft Azure Cloud Expansion
problem: Enterprise customers demanded reliable, global-scale cloud solutions.
solution: Expanded Azure services with hybrid cloud, AI integration, and DevOps tools.
results: Captured 20%+ of global cloud market share, second only to AWS.
author: EduVault Research Team
